name: Typography
description: Hall is a bespoke typeface that mirrors and embodies the qualities of a true market leader â€“ as expected by our target group: confident, competent and determined. Yet, it should feel stable, organic, and personable and at the same time emphasise our engineering and functional capacity. Being bold without being arrogant, it creates credibility for our capability to act on on a broader scale. Developed together with the wordmark and icons, it creates a strong, recognisable and coherent identity.
Always use Hall Display Bold for 30px and above. Always use Hall Bold for under 30px
